meanings.definition: To give a new title to something.
meanings.sent1: She retitled her painting to better reflect its theme.
meanings.sent2: The author retitled his book before publishing it.
meanings.sent3: The cat retitled itself as the king of the house.
meanings.sent4: The retitled movie captured the audience's attention.
meanings.sent5: The teacher retitled the assignment to make it more engaging.

meanings.definition: To change the title of something.
meanings.sent1: He retitled the document to make it more descriptive.
meanings.sent2: The museum retitled the exhibit for clarity.
meanings.sent3: The retitled song became an instant hit.
meanings.sent4: The retitled event drew a larger crowd than expected.
meanings.sent5: The company retitled the product for better marketing.
